attributes.action: Replace the vehicle license with additional duty on fuel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish the PM to abolish vehicle licenceing duty and collect the revenue through tax on vehicle fuel. This would mean that individuals would not be able to avoid the tax as well as being fairer so that those who use the roads most pay the most. It would also further incentivise individuals to use more fuel efficient vehicles and reduce the impact on the environment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
